reviewText: a family favorite, we have watched them several times
A very sweet story about a girl who found a friend in a paint horse.  I loved all the actors.  Great story.

My daughter loves this with the four different movies she could watch! It has been viewed many times. If you have a young girl who loves horses, add this to your collection. You definitely will not regret it!
I absolutely loved both stories. Excellent condition & a very good quality. A++
no sex no cursing and a great family friendly heart warming type of movie that my family likes to watch with the grandparents and the kids

The dvd skipped in several segments.  I played it in my SUV entertainment system and also in my home system and the same "skips" occurred.  I could not see visibly see any "deflects" on the DVD itself.  Did not send it back as having to pay shipping was not worth it.....not blaming the supplier....just not a quality copy from the producer.....

My daughter loved the movie and everything about the purchase was good, especially the price.

I have to write more because Amzon says I need more characters
Purchased as a Christmas gift for my granddaughter. She loves horses, so this product was perfect because it contains 2 movies in 1 dvd. Highly recommend it.

Great Little movies , Great For Family to watch together, I my self and my Husband loved these great little movies  all three movies  were great little movies, I would recomend  them to any family , Thank you
